message.content:
I need to identify the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period from the income statement.

In an income statement, the carrying amount of inventories sold is typically represented by "Cost of Goods Sold" (COGS). This is the cost associated with the inventory that was sold during the reporting period.

Looking at the income statement provided, I can see the following line item:
- Cost of Goods Sold: 353220.00 (dated 2024-02-05)

This represents the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '353220.00'} }
```
